Package org.demoiselle.signer.timestamp.connector

Class TimeStampOperator

java.lang.Object
org.demoiselle.signer.timestamp.connector.TimeStampOperator
public class TimeStampOperator extends Object
Performs all time stamp operations: from the connection with the time stamp authority to the stamp validation.
Author:
07721825741

  • Method Details

    • createRequest

      public byte[] createRequest(PrivateKey privateKey, Certificate[] certificates, byte[] content, byte[] hash) throws org.demoiselle.signer.core.exception.CertificateCoreException
      Creates a time stamp request, signed with the users's certificate.
      Parameters:
      privateKey - private key to sign with
      certificates - certificate chain
      content - set null if signing only hash
      hash - set null if signing content
      Returns:
      A time stamp request
      Throws:
      org.demoiselle.signer.core.exception.CertificateCoreException - exception

    • createRequest

      public byte[] createRequest(String keystoreLocation, String pin, String alias, byte[] content, byte[] hash) throws org.demoiselle.signer.core.exception.CertificateCoreException
      Creates a time stamp request using a certificate of type PKCS12.
      Parameters:
      keystoreLocation - key store location.
      pin - personal identification number.
      alias - alias.
      content - content of the request.
      hash - a hash.
      Returns:
      request as a byte[].
      Throws:
      org.demoiselle.signer.core.exception.CertificateCoreException - exception.

    • invoke

      public byte[] invoke(byte[] request) throws org.demoiselle.signer.core.exception.CertificateCoreException
      Sends the time stamp request createRequest(PrivateKey, Certificate[], byte[], byte[]) to a time stamp server
      Parameters:
      request - request to be sent
      Returns:
      The time stamp returned by the server
      Throws:
      org.demoiselle.signer.core.exception.CertificateCoreException

    • validate

      public void validate(byte[] content, byte[] timeStamp, byte[] hash) throws org.demoiselle.signer.core.exception.CertificateCoreException
      Validate a time stamp
      Parameters:
      content - if it is assigned, the parameter hash must to be null
      timeStamp - timestamp to be validated
      hash - if it is assigned, the parameter content must to be null
      Throws:
      org.demoiselle.signer.core.exception.CertificateCoreException - validate exception

      public void setTimestamp(Timestamp timestamp)

    • getTimestamp
